1022060.name: Fantasy Grounds - Supers, Volume 5 (Token Pack)
1022060.description:
Supers, Volume 5

Got a little something your players need to avenge? Perhaps you need to form a league of justice to battle the forces of darkness in your city? Well, wait no more with Monster Grin's 176 unique tokens of supers, superheroes, super-heroines, and super-villans, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, antagonists, or protagonists! Stunning, more-than-four-color pieces can become horrific heroes from the deep ocean trenches, robot-like healers, mighty mythological mythic beings, and much more!
Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of what's what and who's who and bring your game up to date! Also, with Monster Grin's new Altered States tokens, you can get maximum value from each and every token in this pack and really add that special something to your game!
This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, and silver, as well as ethereal, invisible, stone-skinned, sand-skinned, and altered state versions):
  • 4D Man, Master of Dimensions
  • Abyss, Horrific Hero from the Ocean Depths
  • Ambulance, Robotic Healing Hero
  • Amoeba, The Mutable Mighty One
  • Amphisbaena, Mythological Heroine from the Past
  • Angel, Winged Heroine of Mystic Might
  • Astronaut, Mechanical Multi-tasking Hero
  • Avarice, Awesome Embodiment of Greed and Manipulation
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
